posts.raw_content:
To quote from one of my favorite shows, Person Of Interest, (which everyone should watch) "No one is coming to save you". It's a sad yet profound quote. You see we all have this mentality that the authorities are gonna save us in time of battle or from society becoming out of control, but even Person of Interest shows that even the best may not be abe to save you in time of desperation and war.

We have the benefit of hundreds of thousands of Christian churches all over America. Its time to start organizing at your Church and preparing for war. Train your young on some military discipline. Do excercises as a group. Go to shooting ranges, train them for a war that might come for them. They need meet up locations, trust, and honor within themselves. Teach them how to fight and grapple. There are times when the war comes to you, and you battle it out or lose. We cannot be naive anymore. We know that Islamic mosques are doing this. We know that satanist are doing this through Antifa and NGOs. We know they are quietly preparing. Are we prepared for them? Are they scared of us?

Yet, here we are, we have this board to promote our causes and conduct research. To expose the left and discuss critical ideas and analysis. However we have no direction of action. If this board shuts down for some reason then what? We are left without far reaching comms. We are left scattering the interent looking for the next place of info. We need more than that. We need conservative christians who are prepared. Prepared for their church to get attacked. Prepared for a group of satanisist running around shooting randoms. We need our children to be prepared for the randomness of the current war where people come out of no where and start shooting for no reason at all. This is a war that we have never seen before and we need our people, our christians, our conservatives, our nationalists, to understand that they may not have a choice and war may come to them. We need our churches to start organizing and preparing for war (peacefully). We have a right to do. We have a right to BEAR arms and form groups to protect ourselves from war. It's time we start organizing. Have secret meet up locations, learn and strategize about survivial and military combat. Its up to the citizens to protect their country. No one is coming to save us.
